Submodules¶

cosinnus.core.mail module¶

cosinnus.core.mail.send_mail(to, subject, template, data, from_email=None, bcc=None, is_html=False)¶

From django.core.mail, extended with bcc Note: template can be None, if so we are looking for a content key in data to fill the email message.

cosinnus.core.signals module¶

cosinnus.core.signals.all_cosinnus_apps_loaded = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a CosinnusGroup, or one of its extending models is freshly created

cosinnus.core.signals.group_apps_activated = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a CosinnusGroup, or one of its extending models had one or more of their cosinnus apps deactivated

cosinnus.core.signals.group_apps_deactivated = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a CosinnusGroupMembership for a user has changed

cosinnus.core.signals.group_deactivated = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a CosinnusGroup, or one of its extending models was reactivated

cosinnus.core.signals.group_membership_has_changed = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when a group was invited to an organization

cosinnus.core.signals.group_moved_to_portal = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a CosinnusGroup, or one of its extending models was deactivated

cosinnus.core.signals.group_object_created = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶
Called after a CosinnusGroup, or one of its extending models are saved (create and update)

in the frontend’s group form by one of the group admins

Note: This does not trigger after any other model update or save!

cosinnus.core.signals.group_reactivated = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a CosinnusGroup, or one of its extending models had one or more of their cosinnus apps activated

cosinnus.core.signals.group_saved_in_form = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a CosinnusIdea is freshly created

cosinnus.core.signals.idea_object_created = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a new user and their profile is freshly created

cosinnus.core.signals.organization_group_invitation_accepted = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when a group declines an organization invitation

cosinnus.core.signals.organization_group_invitation_declined = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when a group requested an organization assignment

cosinnus.core.signals.organization_group_invited = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when an group accepts an organization invitation

cosinnus.core.signals.organization_group_request_accepted = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when an organization declines a groups request

cosinnus.core.signals.organization_group_requested = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when an organization accepts a groups request

cosinnus.core.signals.pre_userprofile_delete = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a user has successfully changed their password

cosinnus.core.signals.user_activated = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a user has deactivated their account and marked it for 30-day deletion, or when an admin has triggered this action for a user account in the django admin.

cosinnus.core.signals.user_deactivated = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a user account is activated, or re-activated after being deactivated

cosinnus.core.signals.user_deactivated_and_marked_for_deletion = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called just before a user “deletes” their account and their profile still just now exists, before it will be deleted. Can be used to delete/disconnect any external linked accounts.

cosinnus.core.signals.user_group_invitation_accepted = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when an admin declines a group invitation

cosinnus.core.signals.user_group_invitation_declined = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when a person (not a user yet) is being recruited for a group

cosinnus.core.signals.user_group_invited = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when an user accepts a group invitation

cosinnus.core.signals.user_group_join_accepted = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when an admin declines a user membership request of a group

cosinnus.core.signals.user_group_join_declined = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when a user was invited to a group

cosinnus.core.signals.user_group_join_requested = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when an admin accepts a user membership request of a group

cosinnus.core.signals.user_group_recruited = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when a group is moved to the current portal, serves as a notifcation message for users

cosinnus.core.signals.user_joined_group = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a new user left a group or was kicked out

cosinnus.core.signals.user_left_group = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when a user requests membership of a group

cosinnus.core.signals.user_logged_in_first_time = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a new user properly joined a group as member (invites or join-requests do not trigger this!)

cosinnus.core.signals.user_password_changed = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called when the user logs in for the first time ever

cosinnus.core.signals.user_registered = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a user account has been deactived (this also happens when a user “deletes” their account

cosinnus.core.signals.userprofile_created = <django.dispatch.dispatcher.Signal object>¶

Called after a new user voluntarily signs up on the portal, using the web frontend
